title: Tailored Double-Breasted Cropped Jacket
image_prompt: flat-lay product render of a tailored double-breasted cropped jacket, structured shoulders, peak lapels, two rows of matte horn buttons, welt pockets, high-detail wool blend fabric texture, visible stitching, isolated on plain white background
techpack: Structured cropped jacket with double-breasted front closure, peak lapels, long set-in sleeves, welt pockets, fully lined interior. Fabric: wool blend suiting with polyester lining. Color: charcoal grey primary with matte black buttons. Slim fit tailored silhouette.
provenance: Inspired by contemporary tailored silhouettes from high-end Indian designers, adapted for commercial ready-to-wear.
design_text:
Tailored Double-Breasted Cropped Jacket (TLR-001)
Colors: charcoal grey, matte black, warm taupe
Fabrics: wool blend suiting, polyester lining
Prints/Patterns: none
Garment Type: jacket
Silhouette: structured tailored cropped
Sleeves: long set-in sleeves
Neckline: peak lapel
Length: cropped
Style / Fit: s, l, i, m,  , f, i, t
Trims & details: matte horn buttons, welt pockets, inner lining, topstitch detailing
Techpack: available
